page.title: 07POINTON-CLUBS
page.content: {Pointon Social Club:}In August,1982, the Pointon Social Club,situated beside the well-kept playing fields,was opened.The club house can hold about 60 people. Membership is Â£2 per year and non-members,may come for 25p a visit. At one end of the club building is a bar where drinks and food (salads in summer and hot snacks in winter)are sold.At the other end is a pool table, a Space Invader and Gambling Machines, The club is open 3 days a week from 7.00 pm to 11.00 pm and at the weekends ,on Saturdays 3.30 pm to 5.30 pm,and 7.00 pm to 11.00 pm ,on Sundays 12.00 am to 2.00 pm and from 7.00 pm to 10.30 pm.Cricket and Football teams represent their village. {The Old Ship Inn:}This is the only pub in the village.It has a dart team.
